description: Retrieves the protocol and endpoint that were provided when subscribing to Amazon SNS topics for exception notifications.

nested_items.name: exceptionTimeToLive
nested_items.description: The expiration period and time-to-live (TTL). It is the duration of time until which the exception message remains.

nested_items.name: notificationEndpoint
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account where you receive exception notifications.

nested_items.name: subscriptionProtocol
nested_items.description: The subscription protocol to which exception notifications are posted.
